pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plotting Expected Goals (xG) Stats with 'Understat' Data // Scrapes shots data from 'Understat' https://understat.com/ and visualizes it using interactive plots: - A detailed shot map displaying the location, type, and xG value of shots taken by both teams. - An xG timeline chart showing the cumulative xG for each team over time, annotated with the details of scored goals.
